void waiting(),stop();
int wait_mark;

main()
{
int p1,p2;
if(p1=fork())
{
if(p2=fork())
{
wait_mark=1;
signal(SIGINT,stop);
waiting();
kill(p1,16);
kill(p2,17);
wait(0);
wait(0);
printf(â€œparent process is killed! â€);
exit(0);
}
else
{
wait_mark=1;
signal(SIGINT,stop);
waiting();
lockf(1,0,0);
printf(â€œchild process2 is killed by parent! â€);
lockf(1,0,0);
exit(0);
}
}
else
{
wait_mark=1;
signal(SIGINT,stop);
waiting();
lockf(1,0,0);
printf(â€œchild process1 is killed by parent! â€);
lockf(1,0,0);
exit(0);
}
}

void waiting()
{
while (wait_mark!=0);
}

void stop()
{
wait_mark=0;
}

{
int exitpid;
signal(SIGINT,SIG_IGN);

{

signal(SIGINT,SIG_IGN);
pause();

else
{
if(pid2=fork())
{
signal(SIGUSR1,Int1);
signal(SIGINT,SIG_IGN);
pause();
exit(0);
}
else
{
signal(SIGINT,IntDelete);
waitpid(-1,&exitpid,0);
printf(â€œparent process is killed â€);
exit(0);
}
}
}
